snippet: Businesses have figured out how to track users on multiple devices, raising even more privacy concerns.
abstract: Editorial warns businesses have harnessed new technology to track users on multiple devices, even if devices are not connected to one another, raising even more privacy concerns; calls on lawmakers to pass legislation that sets clear rules that would regulate and limit how businesses collect personal information.
lead_paragraph: Businesses have figured out how to track users on multiple devices, raising even more privacy concerns.
